title: [:de]Shortcode Liste[:en]Shortcode list[:]

fields.message: Address [restaurant-name] [restaurant-street] [restaurant-zip] [restaurant-city] [restaurant-country] Restaurant info [restaurant-type] [restaurant-categories] [restaurant-offers] [restaurant-language] [restaurant-description] Opening hours [restaurant-openings] [restaurant-openings table] -> table instead of div [restaurant-openings plain] -> plain text Contact [restaurant-phone] [restaurant-mobile] [restaurant-fax] [restaurant-email] Social [restaurant-facebook] [restaurant-googleplus] [restaurant-twitter] [restaurant-instagram] [restaurant-pinterest]
fields.label: [:en]Shortcodes for restaurant settings[:de]Shortcodes für die Restauranteinstellungen[:]

description: Can be used in any text field. Shortcode will be replaced with the associated content.
